localization.ja: バンクトゥザフューチャー

description.en: At Bnk To The Future, we started our mission in 2010 to build the largest and most reputable Online Investment Platform in order to co-invest with other professional investors in the future of finance and technology. Today we have the largest community of over 47,500 global professional investors all investing online in FinTech, Bitcoin and Blockchain companies. What is BnkToTheFuture.com? We started our mission in 2010 to build the largest and most reputable Online Investment Platform to allow our qualifying investors to co-invest in the future of finance and technology - globally. What is the BF Token (BFT)? The BF Token (BFT) can be used by all as a reward and membership token to help us create - A less centralised process for listing on BnkToTheFuture.com. - A community enhanced due diligence process for deals we list. - Incentivised, fast and real time Investor relations with more transparency of information. As well as a token to be used by our investors on our existing online investment platform or our trading market the we plan to launch in 2018. Bnk To The Future is a platform that provides the environment for future financial and technology investments with professional investors. Having more than 10,000 BFTs on the platform allows access to future investment opportunities, allowing users to invest in innovative pin tech start-ups, vote on publicly traded shares. It is a system that allows professional investors investing in more than 60,000 PINTech, cryptography, and block chain companies on the BFT platform and has a preferred access to future transactions with 10,000 BFT deposits. In 2018, we aim to establish a legitimate token market securities market. In particular, Simon Dixon, a block chain master, is a key member of the project team. In particular, the portfolio includes BitStamp, Kraken, Bitfinex, ShapeShift, Bitpay, Kim, BitPesa, Unocoin, MaidSafe, Coinsecure, Factom and Uphold.

description.ko:
미래 금융 및 기술 관련 투자를 전문 투자자들과 함께 할 수 있는 환경을 제공하는 플랫폼

10,000 BFT이상을 플랫폼에 예치하면 미래의 투자혜택에 접근 우선 권한이 주어지는 구조로서 사용자들이 혁신적인 핀테크 스타트업에 투자, 상장투표를 할 수 있고 수익분배 운영 또한 투명하게 수 있는 플랫폼

BFT 풀랫폼에 60,000명 이상의 핀테크, 암호화폐, 블록체인 회사에 투자를 하고 있는 전문 투자자들이 포진하고 있으며 10,000BFT의 예치금으로 미래 거래에 대한 우선적 접근권한을 가질 수 있는 시스템입니다. 2018년에는 합법적인 토큰 마켓 증권 시장개설을 목표로 하고 있습니다. 특히 프로젝트 팀 핵심멤버이자 CEO로 블록체인계의 거장인 Simon Dixon이 재직중인 점이 특징입니다. 특히 포트폴리오 구성에는 BitStamp, Kraken, Bitfinex, ShapeShift, Bitpay, Kim, BitPesa, Unocoin, MaidSafe, Coinsecure, Factom, Uphold등 외에도 다수가 참여하고 있습니다.

description.th: At Bnk To The Future, we started our mission in 2010 to build the largest and most reputable Online Investment Platform in order to co-invest with other professional investors in the future of finance and technology. Today we have the largest community of over 47,500 global professional investors all investing online in FinTech, Bitcoin and Blockchain companies. What is BnkToTheFuture.com? We started our mission in 2010 to build the largest and most reputable Online Investment Platform to allow our qualifying investors to co-invest in the future of finance and technology - globally. What is the BF Token (BFT)? The BF Token (BFT) can be used by all as a reward and membership token to help us create - A less centralised process for listing on BnkToTheFuture.com. - A community enhanced due diligence process for deals we list. - Incentivised, fast and real time Investor relations with more transparency of information. As well as a token to be used by our investors on our existing online investment platform or our trading market the we plan to launch in 2018. Bnk To The Future is a platform that provides the environment for future financial and technology investments with professional investors. Having more than 10,000 BFTs on the platform allows access to future investment opportunities, allowing users to invest in innovative pin tech start-ups, vote on publicly traded shares. It is a system that allows professional investors investing in more than 60,000 PINTech, cryptography, and block chain companies on the BFT platform and has a preferred access to future transactions with 10,000 BFT deposits. In 2018, we aim to establish a legitimate token market securities market. In particular, Simon Dixon, a block chain master, is a key member of the project team. In particular, the portfolio includes BitStamp, Kraken, Bitfinex, ShapeShift, Bitpay, Kim, BitPesa, Unocoin, MaidSafe, Coinsecure, Factom and Uphold.

ico_data.short_desc: We built the largest community of high net worth investors investing online in FinTech, Bitcoin and Blockchain companies including BitFinex, BitStamp, Kraken, ShapeShift and over 100 others. As we get ready to launch our secondary market for equity-backed tokens in 2018, BnkToTheFuture.com is pleased to launch the BF Token (BFT) for the rest of the community.
